name: Meanwhile in Russia
description:
The player will be controlling Vladimir Suka, an engineer living in rural Russia who fixes and builds vehicles for a living.

The story of the game begins with a military man called Vladimirovich Blyat driving down the road but his car randomly explodes, he goes on to ask Vladimir to fix it and after he does, he decides to join the gang to help out with various things.

The game setting is in rural Russia, hilly and with some mountains in the distance, there will be a farm where Vladimir Suka and Neighbour Vadim live and a barn where they repair the vehicles.

The artstyle of this game will mostly be simplistic 3D, with few polygons and cartoonish looking textures.

The game is open world and the missions are non-linear, meaning you aren’t locked to following a specific path.
